rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MPH5241}

description: Concepts & practice of occupational health and safety management systems within work environments, including the conduct of an audit are examined. Includes accident/incident causation theories and models, investigative techniques, reporting & statistics, safety systems, fire prevention & control. Incident causation and accident types, including slips, trips and falls are also examined.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
